title: Suspended Palaces (6C10)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. When you play this condition, you may spot a Dwarf to place 2 [Dwarven] tokens here. Fellowship: Discard this condition or remove a [Dwarven] token from here to stack the top card of your draw deck on a [Dwarven] condition that has a card stacked on it.
Rarity:	C
